metadata.description: The end could come from any direction. Mega-volcanos. Killer viruses. Asteroids. All that's certain is that the end of humanity is upon us. Join Jack, Cass, and the rest of the Somerset Foundation as they race against the clock to avert extinction-level events. This double issue features BLACK HOLE SON, Parts 1 and 2, and includes 44 pages of story and art plus a bonus section with concept art, sketches, and other behind-the-scenes info! DOOM SOON is slick, sci-fi cool...like Final Destination for the entire human race.
metadata.name: DOOM SOON
